amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to increase the per project funding cap for Section 544 Puget Sound and Adjacent Waters Restoration (PSAW) to $10 million--which is consistent with Section 206 Aquatic Ecosystem Restoration projects and raises the overall authorization level for PSAW.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
